Sentencas: This work analyzes the efficiency and economic performance of different configurations of a coal-fed integrated gasification fuel cell (IGFC) plant with CO2 capture.
Titulo: Energy and economic performance of novel integrated gasifier fuel cell (IGFC) cycles with carbon capture

Sentencas: Our analysis evaluates novel configurations, providing a detailed economic assessment for each case.
Titulo: Energy and economic performance of novel integrated gasifier fuel cell (IGFC) cycles with carbon capture

Sentencas: The plants studied here are based on a pressurized solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) based power cycle integrated with a Shell coal gasifier.
Titulo: Energy and economic performance of novel integrated gasifier fuel cell (IGFC) cycles with carbon capture

Sentencas: The design variations focus on syngas cleaning and pre-processing upstream of the SOFC power island.
Titulo: Energy and economic performance of novel integrated gasifier fuel cell (IGFC) cycles with carbon capture

Sentencas: In particular, we have designed, simulated and optimized three main system configurations; two with a partial methanation process upstream of the SOFC ('TREMP' and 'HICOM' cases, respectively) and one without ('DIRECT' case).
Titulo: Energy and economic performance of novel integrated gasifier fuel cell (IGFC) cycles with carbon capture

Sentencas: Depending on the specific plant layout, carbon capture is accomplished either before or after the SOFC power island, or both.
Titulo: Energy and economic performance of novel integrated gasifier fuel cell (IGFC) cycles with carbon capture

Sentencas: The best performance, both thermodynamic and economic, was achieved by the HICOM case, whose coal-to-electricity conversion efficiency is similar to 55% (lower heating value, LHV, basis).
Titulo: Energy and economic performance of novel integrated gasifier fuel cell (IGFC) cycles with carbon capture

Sentencas: Note that this paper is meant to supplant the preliminary results presented in Lanzini et al. (2012).
Titulo: Energy and economic performance of novel integrated gasifier fuel cell (IGFC) cycles with carbon capture
